Electrostatic Gauntlets are a type of weapon used by Adeptus Mechanicus Electro-Priests. Corpuscarii wear metal apparatuses around their wrists that channel tremendous electrostatic potential from dorsal generators. This can be discharged in a cascade of killing lightning. The Ranged fighting mode of the Electrostatic Gauntlets has a Mag value of 4, and restores 1 value per hour when not in use.
